listings.title: build responsive website and do custom development
listings.comment:
I literally have not enough words to describe Codecapital team and their work. They are the best out there. They provided everything I asked for in such a short period of time. Every single request was approved and done perfectly. There's never a "no" or "but" or any type of situation where the team can't deliver. They are on top their game, they are nice, friendly and very reactive.
It's the 3rd time I'm using the team and I'm still so amazed about how amazing they are. 
Don't look anywhere else, Codecapital is the number 1 team!!

listings.title: build responsive website and do custom development
listings.comment: I mean were do I begin? Flat-out phenomenal experience with Shahab and his team. Every part from beginning to end was one of the best entrepreneurial experiences of my life. They built me an absolute beautiful and efficient state of the art website from scratch, and they were very Intune with what I wanted, and needed and how we can take it to another level. They far exceeded my expectations, and words can't describe how appreciative I am of all their help and skillset.

listings.title: build responsive website and do custom development
listings.comment:
Working with Ahmed and Code Capital was an incredible experience. They built me an amazing looking website ready and easy to use within a couple of months. They helped me with everything I asked, they went above and beyond to create the website I asked. Even tho I wasn't too sure about what to, with their expertise and experience they guided me through every single steps. Ahmed was in touch with me very often and and was always available when I needed him. Easy to talk to, we understood each other and was very nice during the whole process.
I'm very happy with the team and very happy with what they did for me. 
I highly highly recommend to work with Code Capital if you need a new website or anything they do because they are amazing.
I will always work with them!!!

listings.title: build responsive website and do custom development
listings.comment:
Codecapital is the only team I work with and everytime they keep proving me why I never go anywhere else.
Hard workers, great listeners, always available and understand there are deadlines so they will do the extra work.
My website juste keeps getting better and better

listings.title: build responsive website and do custom development
listings.comment: Codecapital truly IMPRESSED with their exceptional professionalism and expertise in website development! The quality of their work went above and beyond what I expected, and collaborating with them was a breeze thanks to their cooperative nature and quick responsiveness. Highly RECOMMEND! 👍
